text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
With all of Symboli Rudolf's races over,<n>now is as
good a time as any to reflect<n>on her
achievements.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The weight atop my head has grown<n>rather
crushing since the days of my<n>debut.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
But if that is the price of the Emperor's<n>glory,
then so be it!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Indeed. That is precisely why I sought<n>them.
choice_data_list: I'm proud to be your trainer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I daresay we have earned ourselves one<n>day of
merriment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Let's make the most of it, Trainer.
